content.contentDescription: An image of a natural spring. There is a waterfall in the foreground, spilling from the spring. Moss-covered rocks are visible in the background, behind steam in the air, illuminated by rays of sunshine piercing through a canopy of trees above.

content.text: Maria lives in a small village. Every morning she takes a walk in the forest next to her house. She loves the peace and the fresh air.
One day she hears the sound of flowing water. She follows the sound and discovers a spring. The water is warm.
“A healing bath!” she thinks. A healing bath is a natural water basin with warm water. Many people believe that such water has healing powers.
Maria has an idea. She could come here and relax. Maybe she could even invite her friends.
But then she sees something at the bottom of the healing bath. It is a small, shiny object. Maria picks it up. It is an old coin.
Suddenly she hears a voice behind her: “That is my coin!” Maria turns around and sees an old woman. The woman looks friendly, but her eyes are sad.
“This healing bath belongs to my family,” says the old woman. “I lost this coin here many years ago.”
Maria feels bad. She gives the woman the coin back and apologizes.
The old woman smiles. “It is alright,” she says. “But this healing bath has a secret. It can only be seen by those who are pure of heart.”
Maria is surprised. She thanks the woman and leaves the healing bath.
The next day Maria brings her friends to the forest. But they cannot find the healing bath. It has disappeared.
Maria smiles. She now knows that some things in life are meant only for her.
